target: Like buying fruit or picking clothing, since they have to do with color.
context: <user> Color blindness is a serious health challenge ,reported by W.H.O <system> I wouldn't know since I don't deal with color blindness, but it seems bad to have that kind of vision. <user> So what do you know about the endemic ,especially in sub Saharan region? <system> Not really, but I know that it makes some educational activities difficult. <user> I don't understand <system> Well being color blind can make certain activities difficult. <user> Certain activities like what? <system>
